### Posterior: N = 250
PBF.use <- PBF
obese   <- sum(PBF.use == 1)
N       <- length(PBF.use)

a       <- 3
b       <- 7
curve(dbeta(x, a + obese, b + (N - obese)), yaxt = "n", ylim = c(0, 17), xlim = c(.15, .35), 
      n = 10001, bty = "n", las = 1, col = "#4b0306", xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i", 
      xlab = "", ylab = "", main = "Posterior (N = 250)", 
      lwd = 2)
polygon(x = c(seq(.15, .35, length.out = 100), seq(.35, .15, length.out = 100)), 
        y = c(dbeta(c(seq(.15, .35, length.out = 100)), a + obese, b + (N - obese)), rep(0, 100)), 
        col = rgb(75/256, 3/256, 6/256, .2), border = NA)
